content: embark on a crocheting adventure with our latest creation the pomander mug rug crochet pattern inspired by the beloved stitch combination from my unisex pomander scarf pattern this coaster / mug rug design adds a touch of rustic elegance to your home decor crafted with an easy to remember 3-row repeat the pomander mug rug is a joy to crochet suitable for crocheters of all skill levels from confident beginner up it s a perfect stash-busting project that you can complete in less than an hour featuring extended half_double_crochet ehdc and crossed double_crochet xst stitches these coasters create a textured fabric that s both visually appealing and practical perfect for protecting your surfaces from hot drinks or plates cotton yarn ensures durability and easy maintenance bring a piece of rustic charm to your farmhouse kitchen with these delightful coasters and stay tuned for the upcoming pomander placemats to complete the set written in us terms ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them these stitches often come with an accompanying video for further clarification ❤ size approximately 6 wide by 4 75 tall ❤ materials i used dishie cotton for mine because i wanted the rustic colours that they have in their range other cottons that would be great for this are paintbox simply aran cotton and lionbrand s 24/7 cotton ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them these stitches often come with an accompanying video for further clarification ❤ size approximately 6 wide by 4 75 tall ❤ materials -
